findings.message:
Reentrancy in Flipper.dent(uint256,uint256,uint256) (../..0xd8a04f5412223f513dc55f839574430f5ec15531.sol#197-213):
	External calls:
	- vat.move(msg.sender,bids[id].guy,bid) (../..0xd8a04f5412223f513dc55f839574430f5ec15531.sol#207)
	- vat.flux(ilk,address(this),bids[id].usr,bids[id].lot - lot) (../..0xd8a04f5412223f513dc55f839574430f5ec15531.sol#208)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bids[id].guy = msg.sender (../..0xd8a04f5412223f513dc55f839574430f5ec15531.sol#210)
	- bids[id].lot = lot (../..0xd8a04f5412223f513dc55f839574430f5ec15531.sol#211)
	- bids[id].tic = add(uint48(now),ttl) (../..0xd8a04f5412223f513dc55f839574430f5ec15531.sol#212)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

Flipper.dent(uint256,uint256,uint256) (../..0xd8a04f5412223f513dc55f839574430f5ec15531.sol#197-213) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(bids[id].tic > now || bids[id].tic == 0,Flipper/already-finished-tic) (../..0xd8a04f5412223f513dc55f839574430f5ec15531.sol#199)
	- require(bool,string)(bids[id].end > now,Flipper/already-finished-end) (../..0xd8a04f5412223f513dc55f839574430f5ec15531.sol#200)
